BIO

Ali Shaikh is a newly college graduate from North American University with B.S. in Computer Science. He is determined to be a teamplayer and a leader. He is specialized in front-end web application ranging from HTML5, CSS3 and basic JavaScript to ReactJS, PHP/MySQL and Git/GitHub version control. As a collaborative person, he is determined to have a great critical thinking skills with systematic approach.
